name: KOMRAT
description:
I am a simple rat. Living the normal, average rat life. I hide in creeks, risk my life for scrapes. There is no time to think or waste: a rat’s life means there is danger in each and every way. But one day, I had a dream: a dream for a better life, for me and my comrades; long, soothing spa baths; snacks made out of the rarest of delicacies; a professional rat massager available 24 hours a day; all of this and more, in my precious dream. Then I woke up. I couldn’t pull myself together to continue this horrendous life. So I took action, gathered some of my friends and decided on my ultimate life goal: I would have the life of my dreams, in this luxurious human hotel, whatever the cost. No matter whatever it takes, or how long it lasts, I WILL risk my life for my komrats.

SFX BY Zapsplat
